EmailTemplate.subject: BlueWave Portal Access
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
My name is Sean, and I am a member of the BlueWave Partner Support Team. We're here to equip you with the tools you need to become a successful BlueWave Partner, starting with ensuring that you have a seamless on-boarding experience.
Before you can access the BlueWave Portal, you will need to review and sign the following documents which were included in your DocuSign package:
1. Sales Service Agreement (sign electronic copy) 2. Confidentiality Agreement (sign electronic copy) 3. Installer Requirements and Criteria Document (check relevent boxes and sign electronic copy) 4. W9 (fill in company name, address, employer ID and sign electronic copy)
We also require the following certificates if you haven't already provided them:
1. Certificate of Insurance (send a copy) 2. Electrical and General Contractors License (if N/A, please send a copy of your subcontractor's electrical license) 3. Business License/Sub-License (send a copy)
In order to get access to your portal, please submit these materials as soon as possible. Once we have reviewed your DocuSign package and certifications, we can provide you with portal access.
If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us. We're happy to help.
Thanks for partnering with us to revolutionize energy.
- All of us here at BlueWave
BlueWave Solar 111 Huntington Ave, Suite 650 Boston, MA 02199
